title: We need source code of pdfpig liabraries like - header, footer custom tables, formatted text etc.
body:
"https://github.com/UglyToad/PdfPig"
I am using above pdfpig library to generate pdf document, but we can not find any types of example which is related to generated bill , invoice , custom tables, header, footers etc.

Please provide some link url which is helpful for me.

Thanks in Advance 
Mukesh
